functions.name: frontdoor_cdn_tls12_enforced
functions.description: Checks if TLS 1.2 is enforced for CDN.

functions.name: frontdoor_cdn_minimum_tls12
functions.description: Checks if minimum TLS 1.2 is set for CDN.

functions.name: frontdoor_profile_waf_policy_association
functions.description: Checks if WAF policy is associated with profile.

functions.name: frontdoor_cdn_profile_logging_configured
functions.description: Checks if logging is configured for CDN profile.

functions.name: frontdoor_cdn_endpoint_tls12_enforced
functions.description: Checks if TLS 1.2 is enforced for CDN endpoint.

functions.name: frontdoor_cdn_profiles_min_tls12_security_policy
functions.description: Checks if minimum TLS 1.2 security policy is set for CDN profiles.

functions.name: frontdoor_cdn_profiles_custom_ssl_sni_enabled
functions.description: Checks if custom SSL SNI is enabled for CDN profiles.

functions.name: frontdoor_cdn_origin_protocol_https_only
functions.description: Checks if origin protocol is HTTPS only.

functions.name: frontdoor_cdn_tls12_protocol
functions.description: Checks if TLS 1.2 protocol is enabled for CDN.

notes: All functions are based on Azure Frontdoor API.
Ensure proper Azure RBAC permissions are configured.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Azure Resource Graph for efficient resource queries.
